subject: 📊 Ready to Expand? SBA Loans Can Help
body:
Hi {name},

SBA loans are one of the most powerful tools for business growth.

We help entrepreneurs like you secure:
✅ Working capital
✅ Equipment purchases
✅ Business acquisitions
✅ Office expansion

We guide you through every step — from paperwork to funding.

👉 Schedule your SBA strategy session with our CEO, Dr. David Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 📁 Simplify the SBA Process with a Trusted Partner
body:
Hi {name},

Applying for an SBA loan can be overwhelming, but it doesn’t have to be.

We handle:
- Eligibility assessments
- Document preparation
- Lender matchmaking
- Loan packaging

Our experience helps you avoid delays and get approved faster.

👉 Book your SBA game plan session with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 🚀 Fund Your Next Big Move — Acquisition, Expansion, or Pivot
body:
Hi {name},

If you’re eyeing growth, SBA loans offer:
- Long terms (up to 25 years)
- Low interest rates
- High approval potential with the right guidance

From opening new locations to buying another business — we help make it happen.

👉 Talk strategy with our CEO, Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min

subject: 📌 Let’s Turn Your Expansion Plan into Reality
body:
Hi {name},

You have the vision — we help with the funding.

Whether you're scaling, stabilizing, or buying time to pivot, an SBA-backed loan may be the best fit.

We’ll help you:
✅ Understand your options
✅ Package your deal
✅ Connect with SBA-preferred lenders

👉 Let’s get it done — book a call with Dr. Doriscar:
https://calendly.com/dcgcapital3/30min
